items.title: Texas immigration lawyer, a U.S. citizen, in DHS mixup gets email telling him to leave immediately or risk deportation: ‘I just thought it was absurd’

items.title: Exclusive: Chainguard secures $356 million Series D as valuation soars to $3.5 billion
items.description: Chainguard raises a $356 million Series D about nine months after announcing its Series C, Fortune can exclusively report.

items.title: Greece—one of the few EU nations with a budget surplus last year—announces $1.15 billion in financial benefits
items.description: Greece’s surplus of 1.3% of GDP—compared to an overall EU deficit of 3.2%—was a marked improvement in financial performance for a country that was in ...

items.title: Fed Chair Powell might have quietly won Trump’s one-sided war with the central bank after the president says he has ‘no intention’ of firing him
items.description: Powell might have escaped Trump's one-sided battle with the Fed unscathed.

items.title: Marco Rubio unveils massive State Department overhaul that includes a 15% staff cut and the closure of 100 bureaus worldwide
items.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio unveiled a massive overhaul of the State Department as part of the Trump administration's “America First” mandate.
